Part Number ‎LED24V259

Package Dimensions ‎8.03 x 4.8 x 4.13 inches
Item model number ‎LED24V259
Batteries ‎1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)
Specific Uses ‎Outdoor Indoor use
Special Features ‎IP67 Waterproof, 80FT 240LED Super Long and Bright, 11 Lighting Moeds, Remote Control Timing Function, Memory Function, Copper with PVC Wire, automatically ON and OFF, Automatically Charge
Light Direction ‎Adjustable

Batteries Required? ‎Yes

Date First Available March 22, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:12 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Home is the warmest place in the world, without a doubt. And home is the best place to share happiness and joy, with family and friends alike. Decorative lights, in this way, can not only embellish the feeling of home, but also bring spirituality, style, energy, glitz, glamour, and gusto! When the inspiration for decorative lighting jumped into Sylvia Lin’s mind in 2016, she decided to make this dream come true and so the brand Ollny was born!

180LED/60FT Series

240LED/80FT Green Wire Series

240LED/80FT Clear Wire Series

300LED/100FT Series

50LED/25FT Big Bulbs Series

【Multifunctional Remote Control Solar Fairy Lights】① Remote Control: Use the remote to switch the solar fairy lights colors and light modes conveniently( Adjusted on solar panel available too). ② Timer Function: 3 timer function (4/6/8H) to schedule solar string lights work times automatically. ③ Memory Function: Restart solar Christmas lights will keep the last time lighting modes.
【IP67 Waterproof Outdoor Solar Lights】The solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof Rated and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof Rated. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED bulb is incorporated with watertight seals, and the string lights wire are made of copper and PVC which is strong and durable. Feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy/storm/snowy days.
【Highly Efficient Solar Powered String Lights】The large-capacity solar panel only takes 6 hours to full charge under sufficient sunlight, and the lighting work time can reach 18 hours. With higher light control settings, it can work normally when it illuminated by car/ street/ lawn lights. The solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving.
【Outdoor Indoor Decorative Lights】Solar fairy lights automatically ON at night and OFF at dawn. Just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place.Supports ground and wall installation to meet your more needs. Perfect for outdoor/indoor/Christmas decorations, wedding, birthday, party, trees, porch, door, garden, patio, backyard, balcony.

Longer, Brighter, Smoother and More Colorful Solar String Light
  • Length of String Lights : Each 80FT/24m
  • LED Quantity: Each 240 LEDs
  • Mode: 11 Lighting Modes
  • Solar Panel Size: 115*95 mm
  • Material: Copper+PVC
  • Waterproof Rated: IP67
  • Remote Control Distance: 10 meters

Why Choose Ollny Solar String Lights?

  • 2 Pack each 80FT 240LED super long solar string lights meet your more needs.
  • Copper wire wrapped in PVC for adding protection and reducing tangling or knotting.
  • 11 modes: 4 steadies on modes (warm white and 3 different mixture color) and 7 flashing modes.
  • Remote Control+Timer Function (4H. 6H. 8H)+Memory Function (keep the last time lighting modes).
  • IP67 wterproof rated ,available on rainy/storm/snowy days.
  • Large capacity solar panel, charging time about 6 hours (under sufficient sunlight) and working time about 18 hours.
  • Higher light control settings,work normally when it illuminated by car lights / street lights / lawn lights at night.
  • Solar panels can automatically charge both the power button is turned ON and OFF.

Read more

Read more

Do you want to make your house dance at night or decorate the big tree in front of your door? Do you want a romantic wedding or have a lively party? Ollny Solar Fairy Lights comes in warm white and 3 mixture colors, 11 modes can meet your more needs.

Higher Light Control Settings

Ollny solar string light is designed with high-level light control, so this solar fairy lights can work well when illuminated by other lights.( Tip: For better nighttime lighting, please pay attention to the distance between the solar panel and other illuminating light sources.)

Super Bright LED

Ollny 2 pack solar string lights each has 80FT, 240LED, super long and bright. The copper wire is wrapped by protective PVC, which will not be tangled or knotted. And each bright LED maintains a constant brightness until it runs out of power.

IP67 Waterproof

Solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED is incorporated with watertight seals, just feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy, storm, snowy days.

Read more

Adjustable Solar Panel

Ollny solar panels and solar fairy lights are detachable for easy installation and replacement. The solar panel was designed to rotate 180°, which can make it absorbing more solar energy and getting longer working effects.

2 Installation Method

Supports ground and wall installation, just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place. And Ollny solar string lights comes with 2m connection cable, easy to meet your indoor and outdoor decoration needs.

Big Size Solar Panel

4.53*3.74 inch big solar panel size absorb solar energy faster. And the solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving. The back of the solar panel can shows the light working state clearly.

Read more





Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Color Cool White Warm White Cool White Warm White Multicolor Cool White
Size 80 ft 80 ft 80 ft 60 ft 60 ft 80 ft
LED Quantity 240 LED 240 LED 240 LED 180 LED 180 LED 240 LED
Power Supply solar powered solar powered solar powered solar powered solar powered solar powered
Lighting Modes 8 modes 8 modes 8 modes 8 modes 8 modes 8 modes
Lighting Modes 3 modes 3 modes 3 modes 3 modes 3 modes 3 modes
Waterproof IP67 IP67 IP67 IP67 IP67 IP67

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:12 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

“Green Design” is not a slogan but a guide for us to obey the laws of nature, and create classic home decoration.

ALBELT, founded in 2020, with modern concept and technology, is specialized in lighting products combined with Earth protection, safety and art. We already provided service to more than 100,000+ users.

Green Earth and better home, ALBELT will always be here with you.

Solar String Light

Christmas String Light

Christmas String Light

Christmas String Light

copper string light

【Widely Used Solar Outdoor Christmas Decorations】: This solar patio lights is a great choice for Porch, Roof, Tree, Backyard, Deck, Barbecue, Umbrella, Fence, Pergola, Bistro, Restaurant, Hotel, Commercial building, Shopping Center, Dinner, Birthday, Christmas, New Year Party and more.
【Quick Charging Technology & Energy-Saving & High Efficiency】: This outdoor balcony lights charging by solar energy, have no extra utility electric cost, and no need to replace the battery. it can work up to 10-12 hours after being fully charged (6-8 hours).
【8 Lighting Modes & Memory Function & Auto On/Off】: These solar twinkle lights have the On/Off button and mode button. You can select 8 different modes to satisfy your diverse needs by pressing the mode button.And the built-in memory chip saves your last modes setting, so there is no need to reset it again.
*NOTES* : 1. Please power ON first before charging, and it will be charged automatically. 2. Be sure the solar panel is in a sunny location – not in a shady area – and the solar panel faces the sun.

Why Choose ALBELT Solar Lights Outdoor？

· Adjustable Heads solar lights outdoor can rotate freely to any direction you want. The solar panel also can be freely adjusted to face the direct sunlight.

· Fast Charging & Long-Lasting: with the premium rechargeable 1800 mAh battery, Solar String Lights Outdoor recharge in just 6 hours and can work all night.

· Built-in Lighting sensor: auto turn on at night, auto charge at day.

·8 Modes’ button design, you can choose the mode according to you need.

Soaking solar power in the daytime, Solar String Lights Outdoor will never miss a chance to light up your dark, leaving a lovely and enjoyable ambiance.

Read more

Perfect decor for outdoor

Our solar string lights is going to meet your various needs with timeless 8 modes.

Auto On/Off

After soaking up the sun 6-8 hours, Solar fairy lights can consistently work 10-12 hours.

IP65 Waterproof

made of premium ABS, solar light outdoor still work in extreme weather like rain, storm, snow and frost. Great decor for outdoor like yard, wall, patio, garden, porch, lawn, pathway, fence, garage

Read more

Read more

What You Get

2 *85FT Solar String Lights

2 *Ground Stake

2 *Stake Connector

1 *User Manual

Specifications:

LED Color: Warm White

LED quantity: 2-Pack 480 LEDs

Battery type: Rechargeable 1800mAH NI-MH Battery

Switch: ON/OFF, MODE

Working Modes: 8 Lighting Modes

Each Length: 85FT

Read more

No wiring, No electricity cost. Put on wall, window, door, floor, ceiling, grass, Christmas tree or building, Add perfect atmosphere to your place.

Why It Doesn’t Work?

Step 1: Before first use, please charge lights under direct sunlight without any shelter for 1 sunny day.

Step 2: Please totally cover the solar panel or put lights upside down and press the on/off button to see if lights light up, if not, press again! Lights should work and then install them in your favorite places.

Please Note:

  • The selected location should not be near strong ambient lighting, such as street lights, which may cause the light to turn off automatically because the light sensor inside will detect the light and will not turn on.
  • How long the light illuminates will depend on your geographical location, weather conditions, and seasonal light availability.
  • If battery capacity reduces over time, switch the light off for 3-5 sunny days in order to boost the batteries

4
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:02 UTC – Details)
